speech:
We offer a wide range of beauty science courses, divided into short-term and mid-term programs:

Short-Term Courses (Quick Certifications):

1. Universal Certificate in Beauty Sciences: 2 months
2. Learner’s Certificate in Beauty Sciences: 15 days
3. International Certificate in Advanced Manicure and Pedicure: 1 month
4. International Certificate in Cosmetic Formulations: 1 month
5. International Certificate in Aesthetics Sciences: 2 months
6. International Certificate in Draping Hues: 15 days
7. International Certificate in Permanent Eyebrows & Eyelash Extension: 15 days
